author: jvanzyl
msg: o in the contextualize method where we are getting a reference to the container but we only need the basis PlexusContainer. The only place we need the artifact enabled container is in the addPlugin method. Otherwise, in standard PlexusTestCases we will get a ClassCastException. You do not need to use an ArtifactEnabledTestCase unless you actually want to use the facilities of the artifact enabled container.

author: trygvis
msg: o Fixing a bug where the resolve dependencies flag was ignored.

author: jdcasey
msg: o Added null check to the loop which adds classpath elements to the surefire test.

author: jdcasey
msg: o Add the model's parent to the set of artifacts to be resolved. This will allow dependency poms' parent-poms' dependencies to be included in the build classpath as implicit dependencies.
